articles.description: Matthew Tkachuk, who was traded by the Calgary Flames to the Florida Panthers in a blockbuster deal last Friday night, says "I hate Edmonton, but I hate Tampa more now."
articles.content:

articles.title: Chase Elliott won't celebrate Pocono win after Denny Hamlin disqualified for failing postrace inspection
articles.description: Chase Elliott said he won't celebrate the victory awarded to him after Pocono winner Denny Hamlin was disqualified when his Toyota failed a postrace inspection.
articles.content:

articles.title: Paul 'Triple H' Levesque replaces Vince McMahon as WWE's head of creative direction
